subject: Australian Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic hired a Serbian folk band to play in the men’s locker room Sunday and proceeded to fete his Australian Open victory until well after 2 a.m.
snippet: Novak Djokovic hired a Serbian folk band to play in the men’s locker room Sunday and proceeded to fete his Australian Open victory until well after 2 a.m.
